locations: nl, netherlands, north brabant, cranendonck, 6026 rb, den engelsman, 8, 51.302141, 5.6368211
short_description: cuyten is an industrial machinery & supplies company based in cranendonck, netherlands.
long_description: cms (cuyten maintenance services) was set up in 1997 by toine cuyten. the company has now expanded into a specialised business with approximately 25 engineering staff. we are located in maarheeze in noord brabant in the centre of the benelux. with machine engineering and maintenance, cms focuses mainly on the food industry. we occasionally work in other sectors too, such as metalworking or machine woodworking. we are at our best where electrical, mechanical, measurement and control engineering come together. in our in-house workshop, we also have various possibilities to create customer-specific products. our people make the difference. cms invests a great deal in training and the development of permanent staff. but we also invest in young talent. our location in maarheeze includes a technical training centre. cms helps businesses mainly in the food industry with filling lines, transport lines, handling or packaging machines and when relocating complete production lines. with a team of about 25 certified engineers, we work throughout the benelux and beyond.

generated_description: cuyten maintenance services, legally known as cuyten maintenance services bv., is a company based in maarheeze, north brabant. the company specializes in machine engineering and maintenance, primarily serving the food industry. cuyten maintenance services offers a range of services including customized machine construction, industrial automation, technical support, process engineering, and energy-saving solutions. the company employs approximately 25 certified engineers and provides comprehensive services such as detailed design, manufacture, assembly, and maintenance of machinery. they also handle the relocation of machines and production lines, ensuring continuous production without unnecessary downtime.
